title: You know the worst part about clubs being down?
body:
You no longer have an idea who the premades are until you are 4-man ganked. 

http://weknowmemes.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/04/feels-bad-man-template.jpg

replies.body:
Dost mine eyes see a downvote?

For Pepe?

_Harumph!_ A meme should not take hate merely because the two worst presidential candidates made it so. A "hash-tag" would be prudent here.

#MemeLivesMatter
#\#AllPepesMatter
{{champion:51}} : I'll have to arrest you for hate speech.
Hate speech? Where? (◕ل͜◕)

Pepe? YOU RACIST PIG SWINE!

I'LL CUT OUT YOUR EYES FOR MAKING ME LAUGH!
I thought I noticed something weird.
Agreed, just the other day I was three man ganked bot and Gankplank and Karthus ulted simultaneously. Definitely not a premade...
New team skin. Team definitely not premade. 10/10 would buy.

Flagged for hate speech 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Flagged for hate speech about hate speech

As a Support Main ........................ this gets to me.

I pick my champion based off the enemy team. If I know they're a premade and have 2 teleports or champions with roaming potential ... I pick {{champion:201}} or {{champion:40}} . But because of this issue, I just pick whomever naturally ... only to get ganked when i'm playing {{champion:16}}.

*feelsbadman*

Nothing's worse than a Soraka getting ganked. I feel so much pity


.


######I hate soraka

I have a Mastery 7 on her .... >_> don't judge me, she's freelo in Ranked lol.
I main {{champion:89}} because i'm the type of Support who hates being bullied, so I counter bully back and teach those pesky ~~mages~~ Ap Supports why they should stick with mid instead of bot lane. Still, I don't blame you for hating Soraka lol.

Dirty soraka main. But seriously tho, she heals too much. She's so annoying that she's top priority in EVERY teamfight. If I'm playing Zed, best believe I'll try hard to kill her. Why? Ult ADC, ADC uses lifesteal to heal half hp, you R back thinking it will be enough. Then you see that fudging global ult vfx from Soraka and you are just like "...Now FO THAT BIH!" -.-

{{champion:267}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:267}}
Edit: fight me
I honestly play Sup Brand and Zyra, but with the actual Support style, sightstone items, then a Rylais, then some cd to help peel.
I don't really play support, but recently I've had a lot of fun playing Nami and Braum.
Did they remove clubs?
They're down due to an automated system bug. There's a whole Riot post on it
Thanks for the heads up m8 {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

I usually just ask in all chat in a nice way, since it's super easy to tell when it's a premade. It's a completely different game with voice comms tbh usually within 5-10 minutes you know, it's only a matter of confirming it. Ran into a 5 man and a 4 man yesterday, both games we just had a duo :[ :[
